title: Progress Software WhatsUp Gold getReport Missing Authentication Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to bypass authentication on affected installations of Progress Software WhatsUp Gold. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the implementation of getReport method. The issue results from the lack of authentication and authorization prior to allowing access to functionality. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to disclose stored credentials, leading to further compromise.
addtionnal_details: Progress Software has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://community.progress.com/s/article/WhatsUp-Gold-Security-Bulletin-August-2024
timeline:
2024-04-24 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2024-11-18 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2024-11-18 - Advisory Updated
